snippet.title: Persona 3 Reload - (FeMC Mod) 1.6.0 Showcase Pet Koromaru Update
snippet.description:
Please read the description

Most of the changes were fixing missing animations and updating the Social Stat Labels for English.  Custom Animations are coming soon so if you want to volunteer for animations we're available soon.  Check the Discord for when that will happen.

See full patch notes
https://github.com/MadMax1960/Femc-Reloaded-Project/releases/tag/1.6.0
Lates Version:
https://github.com/MadMax1960/Femc-Reloaded-Project/releases/tag/1.6.1

Time Stamp:
0:00 Intro
0:10 Angelic Social Stats Name
0:25 new idle standing animation
0:47 Doors Opening 1
1:18 Doors Opening 2
1:24 Doors Opening 3
1:43 Doors Opening 4
1:57 Doors Opening 5
2:30 Doors Opening 6
2:40 Doors Opening 7
3:10 Doors Opening 8
3:13 Washroom Door Opening
3:30 Refrigerator Door Opening Animation Fixed
3:55 Doors Opening 9
4:17 Petting Koromaru Fix
4:32 Velvet Room Sitting Fix
6:42 Social Stats Label Charm: Ingenue
7:03 Social Stats Label Charm: Unique
7:47 Social Stats Label Charm: Queen Bee
8:00 New Game+ Bug Fix for Namiweiko
8:06 Ending and Custom Animation Update from Team.


Credits
Way of Life by Jen cover
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OoeE165hQdQ
Missing Animations and Idle Animation Change - Mudkip
Namiweiko Bug fix - Ray Cooper
Social Status Charm English Label Update - Astro

P3 Reload FEMC mod.  Download the Latest Version from Here.
https://github.com/MadMax1960/Femc-Reloaded-Project/releases
https://discord.gg/TyR8RVZeNx

Instructions to Install the Mod:
https://youtu.be/HNYRgqXCzMM?si=_5h-SI9vie43DH7c

Add on For Joker and Violet Outfits
https://gamebanana.com/mods/553608 Joker
https://gamebanana.com/mods/553425 Violet

Femc Config Adjuster
https://github.com/MadMax1960/Femc-Config-Adjuster/releases
